name: 264 Tools
author: Chris Swithinbank and Hans Tutschku
description: A modular kit providing high-level sound generation, processing and performance tools for students of Music 264 at Harvard University
alert_text:
You have successfully installed (or updated) 264 Tools. 

Welcome to v0.7.2! 

If you’re new to the tools, check out ‘264 Tools 
Overview’ in the Extras menu. 

If you have a patch open using 264 Tools, please close 
and re-open it now.
